_sText:
FIRST CTF + ICESKATING MAP EVER MADE!!!
------------------


##### Instructions: Teams must bring the flag back to their spawn to score points. If they are killed on the way the flag is returned back to the flag stand. First team to 10 points wins and the map is changed. One scout is standing on the middle of the map, try to ice skate to catch it before the other team do!
##### Note1: Use sv_airaccelerate 150
##### Note2: Use Noblock for better gameplay.
##### Note3: For best gameplay use a deathmatch mod.
##### 64 Spawn areas (32/32)
Please, Coment'n'rate it!
==================
HOPE YOU LIKE!
==================

### Learn how to iceskate: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ws0RLfH9po
